StarStorm:

"Looking for someone?? who???"said Starstorm

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/26/04 11:04:45 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Starstorm came in dna quietly sat down around MAxima and with 
alow 
> > voice she said "Maxima.... who was that bot who looked as 
> > Megatron??? is he a clone as Perserpor yelled?"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> Taking hold of StarStorm's arm. Dragging them out into the 
hallway. 
> 
> "!st.. quiet. 2ndly, I don't know." Pausing. " Whoever he was.. he 
was 
> searching for someone." with a pondering intregued & curious look 
upon her face.
